org.xchain

Interface Command

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Chain, EngineeredCommand, Filter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCsvChain, AbstractTemplateCommand, CellCommand, ChainCommand, ChainImpl, ChooseCommand, ChooseCommand.OtherwiseClause, ChooseCommand.WhenClause, CommandList, CommandSourceCommand, CommandSourceCommand.ChildrenCommand, CsvWriterChain, DebugMessageCommand, EvalCommand, ExecuteCommand, FilterChainCommand, FilterChainImpl, FilterChooseCommand, FilterChooseCommand.OtherwiseClause, FilterChooseCommand.WhenClause, FilterIfCommand, FilterList, FilterVariableCommand, ForEachCommand, HandledCommand, IfCommand, IterateCommand, MultiDocumentResultCommand, NullResultCommand, OutputPropertyCommand, ParameterCommand, PipelineCommand, ResultCommand, RowChain, SerializerCommand, TemporaryCommand, ThrowCommand, TraceCommand, TransformerCommand, UrlSourceCommand, VariableCommand, WithCommand

    public interface Command
    The interface for JXPathContext commands. A command defines a single method, execute(JXPathContext), that returns true if the command handled the request.
    Author:
    Christian Trimble

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean execute(org.apache.commons.jxpath.JXPathContext context)
      Executes this command.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        boolean execute(org.apache.commons.jxpath.JXPathContext context)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Executes this command. Returns true if this command completed handling this request, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
